Designing in Context: B Contemporary Advertising, Marketing and Public Relations

In this module, students will explore Advertising, Marketing and PR through a historical and theoretical lens before looking at modern industry trends which are most notably shaped by audience demographics and their technology choices. The rapid move to mobile screens and social media has had a huge impact on communications industries and we will explore how might the future look with the growth of use in AI to link clients and audiences.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Research and understand narrative, language, and user experience in communication design

+  Evidence pitching skills to effectively present design concepts.

+  Proficiently communicate a message and meaning.

+  Apply strategic frameworks to real-world scenarios to develop practical solutions.
